description: Bring a piece of the night sky into your home and learn all about the stars and their special significance for humanity.
This poster is a snapshot of the last dinosaurs on Earth. This is your chance to get a glimpse of what they might have looked like 66 million years ago.
We created this map of the world's population with a special projection method that depicts countries closer to their actual size than traditional maps.
Many people go through life completely unaware of the battles that are fought inside their bodies. Don't be one of those people – get this poster instead.
Black Holes are some of the most mysterious things in the Universe. But don't worry, we put everything you need to know about them on this poster.
This poster gives you an overview of the diversity of life and will help you understand the relationships between organisms.
The complement system is one the reasons you are alive right now. Learn all about it with this poster that we designed in its honor.
This Minimal Infographic Poster is dedicated to our Solar System. It's the grown-up, understated way to decorate your apartment with kurzgesagt.

mainTitle: Starry Night Poster (Glow in the Dark)
description: This poster is positively glowing. Not only because it's beautiful but also because it will literally glow softly in the dark after exposure to UV light.
list: Printed with glow in the dark ink

description: Craving some Vitamin Sea? We've got you! This poster is much less work than an aquarium, but just as soothing and pretty.

mainTitle: The World of the Dinosaurs Poster
description: The world of the dinosaurs was warm, and pleasant – an ancient paradise. For a moment, let's pretend it stayed that way forever…

mainTitle: The Extinction of the Dinosaurs Poster
description: The dinosaurs ruled the Earth for around 165 million years. But in a single day, life on Earth was changed forever.
One day our whole Universe will be gone. But this doesn't mean that we can't enjoy the ride. Let this poster be a reminder to always live life to the fullest.
What is consciousness? We still don't really know. This poster won't get you any closer to a possible answer but it will sure look nice on your wall.
The Titanosaurus lived around 77 million years ago and as far as we know, Titanosaurs were the largest land animals to have ever existed on Earth.
Did you know that the Iguanodon had a thumb? We don't know if it was used as a weapon or a tool but it may have looked something like this.

mainTitle: The Moon Is Far Away Poster
description: The moon has a huge influence on us even though it is incredibly far away. But did you realize how far exactly?
Our bestselling Solar System Poster is the perfect decoration for any room. Put this poster up on your wall and get ready to dream.
What if a cosmic catastrophe such as a supernova were to strike the Earth? Our only hope, a Stellar Engine, is depicted on this infographic poster.
Close your eyes. Count to one. Open them again and admire this beautiful poster on your wall.
Get ready to dream of distant worlds with these two astronauts exploring their new home planet.
A shiny, high-quality poster for everyone who is longing for home.
A shiny, high-quality poster for everyone who is dreaming of a distant place.
Your metabolic processes explained – kinda sorta not accurate at all, but with lots of cute ducks.
